DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate efficacy , safety , tolerability VK2809 lower LDL-C liver fat content patient primary hypercholesterolemia fatty liver disease . The primary efficacy endpoint percent change baseline LDL-C end treatment period ( Week 12 ) . Secondary endpoint include effect liver fat content liver lipid marker , well effect safety tolerability , pharmacokinetic ( PK ) measurement .
